title: Change Magic Pen and Lethality To Make It Clear
body:
It's pretty confusing unless you already know. When you think of magic pen you think "anti tank" but when it comes to flat pen its the opposite.

Suggestion:
Change the name flat pen to something else like it is with AD

Add note to lethality/magic lethality that says "Lethality significantly increases damage to low armored targets"

replies.body: Anyone too bad to understand how it works never buys it anyway.
